name: Find Her Beta 2.2
description:
Find Her is a Maze based gun with dark/ambient music

You play as a retired US Marine that is trying to save his Fiancee from the Taliban, You must go through the giant cave system and find special keys to unlock doors to make your way to the deep under ground base. After every few levels you must face different type of bosses and make sure you don't fail to rescue your beloved Fiancee. The deeper you go the harder it will get and finally once you get to the base you will face Taliban patrol soldiers.

Main Game Page is on Gamejolt:

https://gamejolt.com/games/findheruastudio/481405

Beta Game:

This game is only in early Beta so at the moment the first 6 levels have been made but there is now the first Boss level

Beta 1.0 Update:

player health and damage

Menu Screen started

Music and Sounds added

Android Testing and Controls started

Beta 2.0 Update:

1st Boss Fight

Sapphire Key level 1

Player walking sounds

Still Work in Progress:

Save System

Android Build/Controls

Beta 2.1 Update:

New game warning when there is a current save file
